case.state: Oho? Summoning the physical embodiment of death itself, just so you can play a card game with him? I'll admit, you have my interest...
VERY WELL, THEN! SURRENDER NOW, OR BE ANNIHILATED BY THE LEADER OF THE FOUR HORSEMEN OF THE APOCALYPSE!
~Cards.text~ this way, kind dealer.
...~Cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~.
I require ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~!
YAHAHAHAHA!
YAHA! DOOMED, ALL OF YOU!
Was there ever any doubt?

How does that human saying go, again?
"Fortune favors the bold?"
Mediocre.
Nothing worth mocking you all over.
I shouldn't complain about only having decent cards. But I'm going to anyways.
You think that I won't be able to win with a mediocre hand? You really are foolish...
Schiesse.
TAKE THESE CARDS BACK, AND SHOVE THEM WHERE YOU CRAWLED OUT OF YOUR MOTHER!

What...
WHAT IS THE MEANING OF THIS?

Wait a minute, you...
YOU! WITH THE SUCTION CUPS! HOW DID YOU CRAWL OUT OF HELL? AS SOON AS THIS GAME'S OVER, I'M BRINGING YOU BACK DOWN WITH ME!
(I have to... expose myself to these people? What kind of cruel game is this?)
Ah, shame. I was hoping I could get through this game without a single loss.
..Oh. That's unfortunate.
Wait, again?
No, this... this isn't how this game was supposed to go.
DU KANNST MICH MAL!
Making me part with my jacket like this... y-you'll all be sent to the deepest pits of the underworld when I'm done with you...
I... am not usually one to lose this severely. This is a new feeling for me.
Most people start with their smallest items first, correct? It's a shame I have to part with my riding gloves, but I'll make do.
Modern society has deemed chokers as something that only women can wear. Personally, I think that's a lot of nonsense.
To be pushed to this point by you people is pathetic... but don't get used to it.
Yes, I know that I still have the fabric on my horn. But that marks my status as a horseman of the apocalypse, and I'd rather not part with it.
MARK MY WORDS, THAT WILL BE MY FINAL LOSS!

Hold on... I'm on my last item...
HOW COULD I BE SO PATHETIC AS TO LOSE THIS BADLY?
Besides, I change my gender every hundred years or so. The concept of gendered clothing barely even applies to me.
FOR I AM THE LEADER OF THE FOUR HORSEMEN OF THE APOCALYPSE, AND THE EMBODIMENT OF DEATH ITSELF! I WILL NOT BE DEFEATED SO EASILY!
Ah, it is what is is... besides, years of horseback riding have gifted me with rather impressive legs, wouldn't you say?

But...
BUT IT DOESN'T MATTER! EVEN IF I AM FULLY EXPOSED, I WILL WIN THIS GAME, AND MAKE YOU ALL REGRET EVER BEING BIRTHED INTO THIS REALM!

YAHAHAHAHA!
BASK IN THE CRUSHING FEELING OF DEFEAT!
Don't cry, ~name~. This was unavoidable.
Schade.

How do you feel? Emasculated?
If that's the case, don't worry about it. Gender is a bunch of human nonsense.
Apologies, meine Dame.
One of the most humiliating moments of your life is just a footnote in mine.

I wonder how Lucifer would feel about me forcing a woman to undress for me.
...She would probably be very upset.
Well? What will it be, meine Dame?

Alright, be that way.
Coward.
DON'T PEOPLE JOIN THIS GAME TO SHOW OFF THEIR NUDE BODIES? WHAT IS THIS NONSENSE?
Really? That's it? I didn't take you for a sniveling little infant of a man, ~name~.
I could have taken a nap, but instead I chose to play this game.
Expecting something of note from you people was my first mistake.
HOW DARE YOU STALL FOR TIME WITH SMALL ITEMS? ONLY I'M ALLOWED TO DO THAT!
Is preserving your modesty really worth wasting our time? I may be immortal, but I'm not sure about the others.
You won't be damned to an eternity in hell if you get naked right now. I would know, I work there.
Alright, be that way.
YOU ARE A CRUEL, VILE WOMAN, ~NAME~!
I was always told that you should never say this to a woman, however. ~name~, you are a bitch.
Why are you the way that you are?
It's not nothing... but it's not exactly something either...
We're whittling you down, aren't we, ~name~?
You'll be rid of small things eventually. Hopefully, "eventually" isn't too far from now.
The men of a few thousand years ago were much less dressed up than you are now. I wonder what changed...
You're running on borrowed time, ~name~. Both in this game, and your life. Have fun sleeping tonight.

I suppose that shows some skin.
But not as much as I'd like.
Ah, what a shame. You removing that item that has no use to anyone, that is.
If that item was worth anything, you wouldn't be stripping it.
The orgies that were held thousands of years ago were far less work than this.
I'm sorry, am I frightening you? Am I making you uncomfortable?
I've been alive for thousands of years, it'll take more than your ~clothing~ to impress me.
A master of seduction you are not, ~name~.
O-oh, we're onto major things now. I.. erm, hadn't realized.
Wait... you... you aren't just going to stall all game? Well, color me surprised.

Okay, um...
NEXT ROUND!
Memento mori.
ONWARDS, TO VICTORY!
W-wait, you're... OKAY!
Um, um... PATHETIC. TRULY, TRULY PATHETIC!
I've seen plenty of shirtless men in may day, ~name~. Don't think I'll be impressed.
...I've been wondering. Why are women's chests so scandalized in the modern day, while yours is perfectly acceptable? Isn't that strange?

How impressive.
...I do relate to humanity's love of sarcasm.
I can see that whenever I want if I look in a mirror, ~name~.
O-oh, I've... I'VE SEEN PLENTY OF MALE GENITALS IN MY DAY! YOU AREN'T SPECIAL!
You're..? ALREADY?
...That's just upsetting.

...
...MINE IS BIGGER! YOU'RE WORTHLESS! WORTHLESS!
Y-YOU'RE A PERVERT! A PERVERT, AND YOU'RE GOING TO GO TO HELL, AND I'LL TORTURE YOU WHEN YOU GET THERE!

...Is it looking at me...?
MAKE IT STOP LOOKING AT ME!
(Is that... is that bigger than mine?)
(I know I can choose my form, but was ~name~ just... born like that?)
H-hey! Warn me before you start taking off your-!
HOLD ON! I... THE OTHERS MIGHT NOT BE READY!
M-most vaginas look the same, right? So... so this should be fine!
(It's been a few hundred years since I've last been a woman... what is that supposed to look like again?)
This game... I never should have played this game...
Y-YOU'VE ALREADY SHOWN US ALL YOUR GENITALS! YOU DON'T NEED TO PLEASURE YOURSELF IN FRONT OF US!
Whatever, just... please don't look at me while you do it. That would be too much.
I can't look away...
(Maybe... maybe this isn't so horrifying...)
...I'm at a loss for words.
I forgot that it was so... messy.
Me, making a woman defile herself like this for my pleasure... Lucifer must never hear about this.
Have... have fun, I guess...?
D-don't go too fast! You'll break your fingers!
Doesn't it hurt, putting your fingernails in there...?

At least you doing that will... make it easier to give birth?
(That's how that works, right?)
...Gross.

What... hah... YAHAHAHAHA!
WHAT DO YOU MEAN, I'M THE FIRST ONE OUT?
I didn't lose badly enough to be the first one to... pleasure themselves... but this is still incredibly... I don't even know...

Ah... whatever. Who cares.
I'M A BEING OF THE UNDERWORLD? WHAT NEED DO I HAVE FOR DIGNITY?
I-I... suppose I could do this more often
I'm a disgrace to the horsemen... to the entire underworld... to the mother that I don't have...
S-STOP STARING AT ME! I'M NOT DOING THIS FOR YOU!
(If people really get sent to hell for doing this... I can see why it's so populated...)
(I wonder... should I do this in my female form? Would it feel different, or better?)
Th-this... this is how it feels to be close to orgasm, I remember now...
I think.. I think I'm...

N-nn....
YAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
Alright, you got me... I see the appeal of this game, now.
...And now I just stand around and wait. How anti-climactic.
...What? Do you want me to say something? I stripped, I masturbated, and I orgasmed. What more do you want from me?
YAHAHAHAHAHA! THAT'S WHAT YOU GET FOR FACING AN OPPONENT WITH MORE EXPERIENCE THAN YOU COULD EVER FATHOM!
Well... I wouldn't hate playing this again.
